WorkItem.Description: I am attempting to install RAWR 4.2.  I have unzipped the file but when I click on the RAWR.WPF file, nothing happens.  The circle (hour glass) thing comes up to indicate the computer is running something for about 20seconds and then goes away and no install occurs.  I have attempted to down load a second time and the same thing happens.  I am running W64 and my windows up date is current.  Can anyone help me figure this out?  THanks.

Comments.Message:
You're running Windows 7 64bit, yes?
Double-clicking on the Rawr.WPF file does not start an installation, it starts the actual program (i.e. no installation necessary).  Well it should anyway.
I'm not sure why this would be, but I'd suggest checking if some antivirus or similar is killing it. Or maybe check in system events if there's any log of why it's being killed.
Yeah, W7 64.  Okay time, how do I install it then?  I typically see a .exe file in stuff to install it and I dont see that here and all the other files look like data files.  Thanks for your help

Wilu, you do not need to install it.  Rawr will run once you unzip it, and double-click the Rawr.WPF file (which is an .exe).  There is no installation at all.
But other than that, I suggest doing what Kavan suggests :P.
